amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement certain procedures relating to the public-private competition for Federal jobs and services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new section at the end of the bill: None of the funds made available by this Act made be used to implement the revision to Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76 made on May 29, 2003.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Van Hollen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 210 - 187 (Roll no. 457).
